About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Hello! My name is Ricardo Serrano-Smith. I am from Albuquerque, NM and am currently attending Dartmouth College with a major in Electrical Engineering. I have been programming for 6 years. The first programming language that I learned was C, which I learned in my highschool robotics club. In college I expanded on what I had learned in highschool and have since become a C-Programming TA. This summer I will be working on developing the embedded systems course at Dartmouth.

Education

BA Engineering Sciences, Dartmouth College 2021

BE Electrical Engineering, Thayer School of Engineering 2021

Internships

MTTC- Univeristy of New Mexico

Sandia National Laboratories

Jobs

C-Programming TA

Physics Tutor
